product_name: The North Face Supernatural Down Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Supernatural down jacket for men is built with 950-fill-power goose down, the highest-fill down available, for nearly weightless warmth when and where you need it most. Ultra-premium 950-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Excels for warmth when minimal weight is crucial, such as alpine climbing. Water-repellent down is treated to stay drier longer and dry faster than untreated down. Pertex(R) Quantum(R) nylon ripstop fabric is lightweight yet durable. Baffled construction increases warmth. Hood, hand pockets and adjustable hem add warmth; cuffs feature an elastic binding. The North Face Supernatural down jacket for men stuffs into its own pocket for easy packability.
short_description: The North Face Supernatural down jacket for men is built with 950-fill-power goose down, the highest-fill down available, for nearly weightless warmth when and where you need it most.
